resources.string: DroidHelper help running tests to make them more stable.
DroidHelper remove all account from AccountManager stored with particular accountType via broadcast intent.
$ adb shell am broadcast -a \'DroidTestHelper\' --es ACCOUNT_TYPE your.target.account.type
Need GET_ACCOUNT permission to clear account data for test.
Need ACCOUNT_MANAGER permission to clear account data for test.
$ adb shell pm grant com.kazucocoa.droidtesthelper android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
